title: Bug 4240Can't edit class path entry (1GKEPIF)
description: Bug 4240Can't edit class path entry (1GKEPIF) There is no way to edit an existing entry for a library on the Java Build Pathproject properties page (other than editing the .classpath file directly).NOTES:EG (9/22/2001 11:42:11 AM)this is particularly annoying for variables.we should have an Edit button when a variable is selected.
